long_description: Predict the category of the document in each text column

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The relation contains the text to be classified
input_tables.description: The relation contains the text to be classified

argument_clauses.name: TextColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the column of the input table that contains the text to be used for predicting classification.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the column of the input table that contains the text to be used for predicting classification.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the input columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the input columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: Model
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the model (which you must install in the database before calling the function).
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the model (which you must install in the database before calling the function).
